resources.string: Enter the details listed above. (NOTE: The * indicates that the field is compulsory)
Choose / Capture a Photo of the User / Staff. Use either an existing Photo from the Gallery app, or take a new Photo using the Camera app.
This Username already exists. Please select a new Username.
Confirm your Password to update the Account
Provide / assign a Table Number to the new Table
This Table Number is already present on record. Choose another number.
Number of Seats / Covers at the Table
Please provide the Number of Seats at the Table
Fields marked with a (*) are Required Fields
Are you sure you want to delete this Table? Pressing \"Yes\" will confirm the deletion and will be permanent. You will also not be able to accept orders for this Table.
Provide a name for the new Tax. For example: Service Tax
Enter the Tax Percentage (Enter the percentage without the \"%\" sign)
Please provide the Tax Registration. This is provided by the Taxation Authority on registration
Enter the Tax Registration Number. In some cases, if a Tax is charged, providing a Registration Number is required.
Is the Tax charged on the entire Bill Amount?
Please enter the Percentage Of Bill To Tax
The Percentage Of Bill To Tax cannot be 0

Does this Tax apply on the entire Bill Amount? 

For example, in India (where we are based), we have a Service Tax which is calculated only on 40% of the Bill Amount instead of on the entire Amount. 

So, if a Bill amount is ₹ 1,000, the Service Tax will be applicable only on ₹ 400!
This Tax is already present on record. Please Choose a different Tax Name.
MENU CATEGORY ID (THIS IS AN AUTO-GENERATED NUMBER)
CHOOSE THE TAXES THAT APPLY TO THIS CATEGORY
Please assign an Image that will represent the Category to your Guests. You can either \"click\" a new Picture using a Camera application. Or, you can choose an Image from a Gallery application.
Are you sure you want to delete this Menu Category? Pressing \"Yes\" will confirm the deletion and will be permanent
A Category with the same name already exists in the database. Please choose a different name for this Category
Resto will auto-generate the Menu ID for you
Choose a Category to add the new Dish to. Or create a new Category

Are you sure you want to delete this Dish? Pressing \"Yes\" will confirm the deletion and will be permanent. This will also permanently delete all the feedback on this Dish along with other statistics such as the number of times this Dish was ordered etc.
